author: Simon Difford
description: A creamy frozen drink with real character. Tip: It pays to add the condensed milk and algarrobo (or malt extract) after starting the blender.
name: Ponche de Algarrobina
recipeIngredient: 1 Algarrobo extract (or malt extract from health food shops)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice
